id: Dollar Surges Amid Political Turbulence Abroad
paragraph:
November 17, 2018The dollar jumped to its highest level in a year-and-a-half on Monday, propelled by expectations for higher U.S. interest rates and concerns about an uncertain political landscape in Europe.The WSJ Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was up 0.6% to 91.10, its highest close since March 2017.Investors...
